content.title: Intro
content.content:
1995
Preceded by
1995
1996
Year
1997
Followed by
1997

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1996.

content.title: January
content.content:
5 - English actor Maxim Baldry is born.
19 - The first concert of the Tolkien Ensemble at Gjorslev Castle, Denmark.

content.title: March
content.content:
6 - Actor Simon Cadell dies.
22 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 8 is published.

content.title: April
content.content: ? - Peter Jackson agrees with Harvey Weinstein to be involved in the production of a film project based on Tolkien's works.

content.title: May
content.content:
3 - Author and academic Charles Moorman dies.
14 - Vera Chapman dies.

content.title: August
content.content: ? - Grenadier Models Inc., which had released metal miniatures based on The Lord of the Rings, ceases to exist.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - The Peoples of Middle-earth is published.
2 - A Tolkien Book of Days is published.
13 - Actor Sadwyn Brophy is born.
20-22 - Oxonmoot 1996.
27 - Realms of Tolkien is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
6 - The Peoples of Middle-earth is published in the US.
? - Mallorn 34 is published.

? - Elaine Griffiths, friend and pupil of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
? - Parma Endorion is published.
? - Middle-earth: The Dragons card game is released.
? - Middle-earth: Dark Minions card game is released.
? - Travel and Communication in Tolkien's Worlds is published.




Years
1993 1994 1995 1996 1997 1998 1999
